title: Lowest Nitrous Oxide Emissions
description: North Korea has achieved a significant reduction in nitrous oxide emissions, with a 67.13% decrease from 1990 levels as of 2023.

title: Lowest Hepatitis B Immunization Rate
description: In 2023, only 16% of one-year-old children in North Korea received the Hepatitis B vaccine, one of the lowest rates globally.

title: Lowest DPT Immunization Rate
description: As of 2023, only 16% of children aged 12-23 months in North Korea were immunized against DPT, marking one of the lowest rates worldwide.

title: Highest Female Labor Force Participation
description: In 2024, North Korea had one of the highest female labor force participation rates, with 86.98% of women aged 15-64 actively working or seeking work.

title: Highest Total Labor Force Participation
description: North Korea's total labor force participation rate was 88.996% in 2024, one of the highest globally for the population aged 15-64.

title: Lowest Import Volume Index
description: In 2021, North Korea had one of the lowest import volume indices, with a value of 8.55, indicating minimal import activity compared to 2015.

title: Lowest Export Volume Index
description: North Korea's export volume index was 1.90 in 2021, one of the lowest globally, reflecting a significant decrease in export activity since 2015.

title: Lowest Export Value Index
description: In 2021, North Korea's export value index was 3.16, one of the lowest in the world, indicating a sharp decline in export value since 2015.
